history.proof: intros d a s a0 t H1 H2 H3. split. - intro H6. destruct H6. srun best use: rec_dta, new_state_ins_d unfold: insert_ostate. - intro H8. srun best use: new_state_ins_r unfold: insert_ostate.

original: intros d a s a0 t H1 H2 H3. intros H4 H5. split. - intro H6. intro H7. apply rec_dta in H6. destruct H6. apply new_state_ins_d with (ladj := ladj). + apply H0. + apply H3. - intro H8. intro H9. apply rec_dta in H8. destruct H8 as [H10 H11]. apply new_state_ins_r with (d0 := d) (a0 := a0) (t0 := t); auto. + intro H12. apply H5. rewrite H12. apply H10. + apply H4. + apply H0. + apply H2.
